items.content_html: CakeRace is a fun and lightweight web tool that turns office cake-sharing into an engaging competition. Bake a cake, upload its photo, generate a QR code, and let colleagues rate it using a playful Cake Slice Meter and leave a One Bite Verdict ‚Äî a single word describing their experience. No logins, no hassle ‚Äî just scan, rate, and enjoy. üéÇüöÄ

items.content_html: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you‚Äôre drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.

items.content_html: A lightweight backend service for tracking and managing user locations in real-time. Built with Node.js and Express, it provides APIs for storing, retrieving, and updating location data efficiently.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
items.title: krozamdev/masked-password: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
